p: The daily water change was made up to approximately half of total tank volume. The experiment diets were given for consumption to the fish three times a day as ad libitum at 09:00, 13:00, and 17:00 for 60 days. Water parameters were measured throughout the experiment as temperature was 15.2 ± 0.1°C, pH was 7.2 ± 0.2, and dissolved oxygen was 8.33 ± 0.2 mg/L.
